parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Filters response to only include transactions below before height in the blockchain.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Filters response to only include transactions above after height in the blockchain.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit sets the minimum number of returned TXRefs; there can be less if there are less than limit TXRefs associated with this address, but there can be more in the rare case of more TXRefs in the block at the bottom of your call. This ensures paging by block height never misses TXRefs. Defaults to 200, maximum is 2000.

parameters.name: confirmations
parameters.description: If set, only returns the balance and TXRefs that have at least this number of confirmations.

total_received.description: Total amount of confirmed wei received by this address.

total_sent.description: Total amount of confirmed wei sent by this address.

balance.description: Balance of confirmed wei on this address. (i.e., for transactions whose confirmations > 0).

unconfirmed_balance.description: Balance of unconfirmed wei on this address. Can be negative (if unconfirmed transactions are just spending part of an address balance). Only unconfirmed transactions (haven’t made it into a block) are included in this calculation.

final_balance.description: Total balance of wei, including confirmed and unconfirmed transactions, for this address.

n_tx.description: Number of confirmed transactions on this address. Only transactions that have made it into a block (confirmations > 0) are counted.

unconfirmed_n_tx.description: Number of unconfirmed transactions for this address. Only unconfirmed transactions (confirmations == 0) are counted.

final_n_tx.description: Final number of transactions, including confirmed and unconfirmed transactions, for this address.

tx_url.description: Optional To retrieve base URL transactions. To get the full URL, concatenate this URL with a transaction’s hash.

txrefs.description: Optional Array of transaction summaries for this address. Usually only returned from the standard Address Endpoint.

unconfirmed_txrefs.description: Optional All unconfirmed transaction summaries for this address. Usually only returned from the standard Address Endpoint.

hasMore.description: Optional If true, then the Address object contains more transactions than shown. Useful for determining whether to poll the API for more transaction information.

block_height.description: Height of the block that contains this transaction input/output. If it’s unconfirmed, this will equal -1.

tx_hash.description: The hash of the transaction containing this input/output.

tx_input_n.description: Index of this input in the enclosing transaction. 0 if it’s an input, -1 if it’s an output.

tx_output_n.description: Index of this output in the enclosing transaction. -1 if it’s an input, 0 if it’s an output.

value.description: The value transfered by this input/output in wei exchanged in the enclosing transaction.

double_spend.description: true if this is an attempted double spend; false otherwise.

confirmations.description: Number of subsequent blocks, including the block the transaction is in. Unconfirmed transactions have 0 confirmations.

ref_balance.description: Optional The past balance of the parent address the moment this transaction was confirmed. Not present for unconfirmed transactions.

confirmed.description: Optional Time at which transaction was included in a block; only present for confirmed transactions.

double_of.description: Optional If this transaction is a double-spend (i.e. double_spend == true) then this is the hash of the transaction it’s double-spending.
